verses.verse: Then came near <WH5066> the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the Levites <WH3881> unto <WH413> Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> and unto <WH413> Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun, <WH5126> and unto <WH413> the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478>

And they spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> them at Shiloh <WH7887> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> saying, <WH559> The LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872> to give <WH5414> us cities <WH5892> to dwell <WH3427> in, with the suburbs <WH4054> thereof for our cattle. <WH929>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> unto the Levites <WH3881> out of their inheritance, <WH4480> <WH5159> at <WH413> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD, <WH3068> <WH853> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> and their suburbs. <WH4054>

And the lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites: <WH6956> and the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> which were of <WH4480> the Levites, <WH3881> had <WH1961> by lot <WH1486> out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Judah, <WH3063> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Simeon, <WH8099> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Benjamin, <WH1144> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities. <WH5892>

And the rest <WH3498> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> had by lot <WH1486> out of the families <WH4480> <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim, <WH669> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Dan, <WH1835> and out of the half <WH4480> <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> ten <WH6235> cities. <WH5892>

And the children <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> had by lot <WH1486> out of the families <WH4480> <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar, <WH3485> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Asher, <WH836> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Naphtali, <WH5321> and out of the half <WH4480> <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> in Bashan, <WH1316> thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities. <WH5892>

The children <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> by their families <WH4940> had out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Reuben, <WH7205> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Zebulun, <WH2074> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities. <WH5892>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> by lot <WH1486> unto the Levites <WH3881> <WH853> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> with <WH854> their suburbs, <WH4054> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses. <WH4872>

And they gave <WH5414> out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Judah, <WH3063> and out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon, <WH8095> <WH853> these <WH428> cities <WH5892> which <WH834> are here mentioned <WH7121> by name, <WH8034>

Which the children <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> being of the families <WH4480> <WH4940> of the Kohathites, <WH6956> who were of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Levi, <WH3878> had: <WH1961> for <WH3588> theirs was <WH1961> the first <WH7223> lot. <WH1486>

And they gave <WH5414> them <WH853> the city <WH7151> of Arba <WH704> the father <WH1> of Anak, <WH6061> which <WH1931> city is Hebron, <WH2275> in the hill <WH2022> country of Judah, <WH3063> with <WH854> the suburbs <WH4054> thereof round about <WH5439> it.
But the fields <WH7704> of the city, <WH5892> and the villages <WH2691> thereof, gave <WH5414> they to Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> for his possession. <WH272>

Thus they gave <WH5414> to the children <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> <WH853> Hebron <WH2275> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> to be <WH853> a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer; <WH7523> and Libnah <WH3841> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
And Jattir <WH3492> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Eshtemoa <WH851> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
And Holon <WH2473> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Debir <WH1688> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>

And Ain <WH5871> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Juttah <WH3194> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and <WH853> Beth-shemesh <WH1053> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> nine <WH8672> cities <WH5892> out of <WH4480> <WH854> those <WH428> two <WH8147> tribes. <WH7626>
And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Benjamin, <WH1144> <WH853> Gibeon <WH1391> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Geba <WH1387> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
<WH853> Anathoth <WH6068> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Almon <WH5960> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>
All <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the children <WH1121> of Aaron, <WH175> the priests, <WH3548> were thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs. <WH4054>

And the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath, <WH6955> the Levites <WH3881> which remained <WH3498> of the children <WH4480> <WH1121> of Kohath, <WH6955> even they had <WH1961> the cities <WH5892> of their lot <WH1486> out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Ephraim. <WH669>

For they gave <WH5414> them <WH853> Shechem <WH7927> with <WH854> her suburbs <WH4054> in mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> to be <WH853> a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer; <WH7523> and Gezer <WH1507> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
And Kibzaim <WH6911> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Beth-horon <WH1032> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>
And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Dan, <WH1835> <WH853> Eltekeh <WH514> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Gibbethon <WH1405> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
<WH853> Aijalon <WH357> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Gath-rimmon <WH1667> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>

And out of the half <WH4480> <WH4276> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> <WH853> Tanach <WH8590> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Gath-rimmon <WH1667> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> two <WH8147> cities. <WH5892>
All <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> were ten <WH6235> with their suburbs <WH4054> for the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> that remained. <WH3498>

And unto the children <WH1121> of Gershon, <WH1648> of the families <WH4480> <WH4940> of the Levites, <WH3881> out of the other half <WH4480> <WH2677> tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh <WH4519> they gave <WH853> Golan <WH1474> in Bashan <WH1316> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> to be <WH853> a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer; <WH7523> and Beesh-terah <WH1203> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> two <WH8147> cities. <WH5892>
And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Issachar, <WH3485> <WH853> Kishon <WH7191> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Daberath <WH1705> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
Jarmuth <WH3412> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> En-gannim <WH5873> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>
And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Asher, <WH836> <WH853> Mishal <WH4861> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Abdon <WH5658> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
<WH853> Helkath <WH2520> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Rehob <WH7340> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>

And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Naphtali, <WH5321> <WH853> Kedesh <WH6943> in Galilee <WH1551> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> to be <WH853> a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer; <WH7523> and Hammoth-dor <WH2576> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Kartan <WH7178> with her suburbs; <WH4054> three <WH7969> cities. <WH5892>
All <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the Gershonites <WH1649> according to their families <WH4940> were thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs. <WH4054>

And unto the families <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Merari, <WH4847> the rest <WH3498> of the Levites, <WH3881> out of <WH4480> <WH854> the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun, <WH2074> <WH853> Jokneam <WH3362> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and <WH853> Kartah <WH7177> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
<WH853> Dimnah <WH1829> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Nahalal <WH5096> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>
And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Reuben, <WH7205> <WH853> Bezer <WH1221> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Jahazah <WH3096> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
<WH853> Kedemoth <WH6932> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> and Mephaath <WH4158> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities. <WH5892>

And out of the tribe <WH4480> <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> <WH853> Ramoth <WH7216> in Gilead <WH1568> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> to be <WH853> a city <WH5892> of refuge <WH4733> for the slayer; <WH7523> and Mahanaim <WH4266> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054>
<WH853> Heshbon <WH2809> with <WH854> her suburbs, <WH4054> <WH853> Jazer <WH3270> with <WH854> her suburbs; <WH4054> four <WH702> cities <WH5892> in all. <WH3605>

So all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> for the children <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847> by their families, <WH4940> which were remaining <WH3498> of the families <WH4480> <WH4940> of the Levites, <WH3881> were <WH1961> by their lot <WH1486> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> cities. <WH5892>

All <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the Levites <WH3881> within <WH8432> the possession <WH272> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> were forty <WH705> and eight <WH8083> cities <WH5892> with their suburbs. <WH4054>
These <WH428> cities <WH5892> were <WH1961> every one <WH5892> <WH5892> with their suburbs <WH4054> round about <WH5439> them: thus <WH3651> were all <WH3605> these <WH428> cities. <WH5892>

And the LORD <WH3068> gave <WH5414> unto Israel <WH3478> <WH853> all <WH3605> the land <WH776> which <WH834> he swore <WH7650> to give <WH5414> unto their fathers; <WH1> and they possessed <WH3423> it, and dwelt <WH3427> therein.

And the LORD <WH3068> gave them rest <WH5117> round about, <WH4480> <WH5439> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> he swore <WH7650> unto their fathers: <WH1> and there stood <WH5975> not <WH3808> a man <WH376> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> their enemies <WH341> before <WH6440> them; the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> <WH853> all <WH3605> their enemies <WH341> into their hand. <WH3027>

There failed <WH5307> not <WH3808> aught <WH1697> of any <WH4480> <WH3605> good <WH2896> thing <WH1697> which <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> unto <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> all <WH3605> came to pass. <WH935>
